description: Try our easy to follow Choc Pop Slice recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Slice,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Low salt,Egg free,Sesame free,Quick & easy dessert,Halal,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Chocolate
name: Choc Pop Slice Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Line base and sides of a 20cm square cake pan with baking paper.

Place 4 cups crispy rice pops and 60g slivered almonds, toasted, in a large bowl. Break 300g milk cooking chocolate into squares and place into a heatproof bowl with 200g sweetened condensed milk and 60g unsalted butter, chopped. Place bowl on top of a small pan of simmering water, ensuring base of bowl does not touch the water. Stir with a spatula for 5 minutes or until melted and smooth. Pour over rice pops and stir to combine.

Transfer to pan, spread out evenly and smooth surface. Melt remaining 100g cooking chocolate and 30g butter in a small bowl over a small pan of simmering water until smooth. Pour over slice and smooth. Chill for 30 minutes or until set. Slice and serve.
